title: Design a Test Strategy
description: Plan the test strategy for a user authentication feature.
instructions:
You are building a user authentication system with the following features:
- User registration with email validation
- Password hashing
- Login with email and password
- JWT token generation
- Token validation

Write out a test plan that identifies:
1. At least 3 unit tests you would write
2. At least 2 integration tests
3. At least 1 end-to-end test

For each test, describe what it tests and why it matters.

hints.text: Think about what functions can be tested WITHOUT external dependencies - those are your unit tests.
Integration tests should involve the database or multiple services working together.
E2E tests simulate real user journeys - from registration all the way to accessing protected resources.
